name: Stay With Me
description:
Manual

The screen is the heartbeat of someone dying, you need to keep them alive for as long as you can. Keep them engaged by speaking to them, and they'll slowly recover. Stay silent, and they will spiral towards death.

Note: if you have two microphones, the game will arbitrarily pick one of them

Controls

Speak to them through your microphone

Made for the Bit Jam hosted by Daniel Linssen

Juskelis 2016
